short_description: showakigyo co. ltd. is a building material manufacturer based in matsumoto, japan.
generated_description: showakigyo co. ltd. is a specialized trading company based in matsumoto, nagano prefecture, japan. founded in 1964, the company has built a reputation for providing essential materials for water supply, drainage, and building facilities. over the years, showakigyo has expanded its services to include civil engineering materials, agricultural supplies, and various mechanical and electrical equipment. in april 2022, the company became a member of the fuji machinery group, a comprehensive construction materials trading company with a nationwide presence. showakigyo continues to contribute to the development of local communities by offering regionally focused services and maintaining a strong network across nagano, niigata, gifu, and shizuoka prefectures.
